name: Hardware Cosmetology

name: Aesthetic Cosmetology
description: This Level 1 course offers intensive coverage of key topics such as skin conditioning, chemical peeling, dermal injectables, laser training, and most importantly common complications and management of such complications. The programme includes theory lectures, live demonstrations, and hands-on training with volunteers.

name: Injection Cosmetology
description: Injection cosmetology is a complex of procedures that will help your face and body always stay young. It is the injection technique that allows you to quickly, efficiently and safely: fight age-related skin changes. deeply moisturize the skin from the inside. eliminate skin imperfections.

name: Laser Cosmetology
description: Laser cosmetology is used for a variety of aesthetic procedures. One of the most well known of these procedures is permanent hair removal.
